sex.text: the participant's gender dummy coded (female=0 male=1)

education.text: the participant's education in years(0=High school (Year 9 or lower), 1=High school (Year 10), 2=High school (Year 12), 3=Certificate 1 & 2, 4=Certificate 3 & 4, 5=Diploma / Advanced Diploma, 6=Bachelor’s Degree, 7=Graduate Certificate / Diploma, 8=Master’s Degree, 9=Doctoral Degree)

vr_experience.text: the participant's experience with virtual reality (0=Never, 1=Less than 1 hour, 2=1 – 10 hours, 3=10 – 50 hours, 4=More than 50 hours)

typical_sleep.text: the participant's typical sleep duration in hours

NART_score.text: the participant's NART score, higher = better

NART_time.text: the participant's NART time in seconds

RPM_score.text: the participant's Raven's Progressive Matrices score, higher = better

RPM_time.text: the participant's Raven's Progressive Matrices time in seconds

BVMT_total_recall.text: the participant's total recall score for the Brief Visuospatial Memory Test, higher = better

BVMT_learning.text: the participant's learning score for the Brief Visuospatial Memory Test, higher = better

BVMT_percent_recalled.text: the participant's percent recalled score for the Brief Visuospatial Memory Test, higher = better

BVMT_recognition_hits.text: the participant's recognition hits score for the Brief Visuospatial Memory Test, higher = better

BVMT_recognition_false_alarms.text: the participant's recognition false alarms score for the Brief Visuospatial Memory Test, lower = better

BVMT_recognition_discrimination_index.text: the participant's recognition discrimination index score for the Brief Visuospatial Memory Test, higher = better

BVMT_recognition_response_bias.text: the participant's response bias score for the Brief Visuospatial Memory Test, higher = better

RAVLT_trial_1_score.text: the participant's trial 1 score for the Rey Auditory Verbal Learning Test, higher = better

RAVLT_trial_1_time.text: the participant's trial 1 time for the Rey Auditory Verbal Learning Test in seconds

RAVLT_trial_2_score.text: the participant's trial 2 score for the Rey Auditory Verbal Learning Test, higher = better

RAVLT_trial_2_time.text: the participant's trial 2 time for the Rey Auditory Verbal Learning Test in seconds

RAVLT_trial_3_score.text: the participant's trial 3 score for the Rey Auditory Verbal Learning Test, higher = better

RAVLT_trial_3_time.text: the participant's trial 3 time for the Rey Auditory Verbal Learning Test in seconds

RAVLT_trial_4_score.text: the participant's trial 4 score for the Rey Auditory Verbal Learning Test, higher = better

RAVLT_trial_4_time.text: the participant's trial 4 time for the Rey Auditory Verbal Learning Test in seconds

RAVLT_trial_5_score.text: the participant's trial 5 score for the Rey Auditory Verbal Learning Test, higher = better

RAVLT_trial_5_time.text: the participant's trial 5 time for the Rey Auditory Verbal Learning Test in seconds

RAVLT_trial_distraction_score.text: the participant's distraction trial score for the Rey Auditory Verbal Learning Test, higher = better

RAVLT_trial_distraction_time.text: the participant's distraction trial time for the Rey Auditory Verbal Learning Test in seconds

RAVLT_trial_free_recall_score.text: the participant's free recall trial score for the Rey Auditory Verbal Learning Test, higher = better

RAVLT_trial_free_recall_time.text: the participant's free recall trial time for the Rey Auditory Verbal Learning Test in seconds

RAVLT_delayed_recall_duration.text: the length of time before the participant's delayed recall trial in the Rey Auditory Verbal Learning Test, higher = better

RAVLT_trial_delayed_recall_score.text: the participant's delayed recall trial score for the Rey Auditory Verbal Learning Test, higher = better

RAVLT_trial_delayed_recall_time.text: the participant's delayed recall trial time for the Rey Auditory Verbal Learning Test in seconds

RAVLT_recognition_hits.text: the participant's recognition hits for the Rey Auditory Verbal Learning Test, higher = better

RAVLT_recognition_misses.text: the participant's recognition false alarms for the Rey Auditory Verbal Learning Test, higher = better

RAVLT_trial_12345_total.text: the participant's total score for the first 5 trials of the Rey Auditory Verbal Learning Test, higher = better

RAVLT_sum_of_trials.text: the participant's total score for all trials of the Rey Auditory Verbal Learning Test, higher = better
